resources.string: Select the days that the alarm will repeat.
Change app preferences as language and time system
Set sync option to best experience.
Start To Sync Maps Before Ring The Alarm
How Much Time Do You Need To Be Ready To Leave?
Set a new name for the alarm.
Are you sure you want to delete the alarm?
Are you sure you want to save this alarm?
Alarm saved and was set to ring sooner!
Same or bigger event start time was used, you cannot continue.
Failed to calculate traffic time. Verify your internet and try again.
Place not selected! Select a place to continue.
Your ringtone was set to Silent. Are you sure you want to continue?

Tempus is an incredible alarm clock that uses the traffic information to help you never be late for any further engagement. Through an incredible traffic monitoring system, Tempus can estimate the time it takes for you to reach a marked event on your calendar.
